attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Why is it that we have to pay so much for a mortgage .
if you borrow say £150,000 over 25 years you pay nearly over double back !!
Is it not the case that the whole Mortgage system is still run in a way from when houses where priced in the 1960's 
The whole system needs to be updated so that we have cheaper affrodable mortgages over shorter terms instaed of working all our lives just to pay off a house .Interest rates on such large sums of cash should not be allowed its nothing short than robbery
